item.title: How to create a blog using hugo
item.description: I have recently created my first site using hugo, so I thought the first post should be the process of creating a site using hugo. Step 1 - Install Hugo Go to Hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. Instructions here will be relevant for windows but can be applied to other OS with some tweaks. Put the hugo executable into the PATH environment variable so it accessible from everywhere.
